title: Trust and Safety Analyst, Developer Experience, Compute
location: Hyderabad, Telangana, India; Bengaluru, Karnataka, India
description: Trust & Safety team members are tasked with identifying and taking on the biggest problems that challenge the safety and integrity of our products.
key_qualifications:
Bachelor's degree or equivalent practical experience.
7 years of experience in data analytics, Trust and Safety, policy, cybersecurity, or related fields.
preferred_qualifications:
5 years of experience with data analysis.
Experience in Trust and Safety.
Knowledge and experience in data analysis to drive insights and recommendations.
Ability to see the larger picture and connect dots across teams, insights, and initiatives.
Analyze and solve problems using data and statistical methods.
Comfort and proficiency working in a highly cross-functional team environment in a new and burgeoning space.
responsibilities:
Work cross-functionally with a variety of teams to enhance developer experience by gathering and synthesizing developer insights and driving projects to optimize policy experiences for developers.
Develop processes to systemically distill insights from escalations and support channels for reporting and prioritization of projects and initiatives that improve the developer experience.
Create and manage developer feedback and listening forums.
